embeddedItem.name: Punitive Energy
embeddedItem.desc: Upon use, immediately recovers 4 Technique Points for your team, but each team member loses HP equal to <nobr>15%</nobr> of their Max HP.
embeddedItem.lore:
Energy drink that tastes strange. Drinking it almost feels like some punishment game.
Just looking at it fills you with determination.

"If anger can be used as energy, mine is off the charts."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

273405.name: Trash
273405.desc: Upon use, immediately causes a single ally to lose HP equal to <nobr>15%</nobr> of their Max HP.
273405.lore:
Worthless trash.
Better carry some with you.

"Some say that in the deep retreats of the Galaxy, an invisible portal will open to those carrying a piece of junk."
comeFrom: Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI

757744.name: Virtual Particle
757744.lore:
Tiny particles commonly found in the universe but cannot be observed in theory.
Scientists are good at transforming theories into reality.

"I've got a virtual particle and an anti virtual particle here. How do we turn them into a real particle and a real antiparticle? Now, look closely..."
comeFrom: Storage Zone: Baryons or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station

872132.name: Recipe: Punitive Energy
872132.desc: A simple equation. When entered into the Synthesizer, it will unlock a new recipe.
